body.p: Born on July 30, 1816. George T. Edwards, attorney. Admitted to the bar in 1855. Married to Margaret Connelly Edwards (1824-1861) and then Mariah L. Emmett Edwards (1821-1895). Children included Presley, Lucreita, Mary P., Caroline C., George B., James C. Died on May 3, 1895 in Russellville.
